mapper.insert: insert into dict_category (category_id, name, remark, create_time) values (0, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now())

update dict_category set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
